landing.title: Alaouda Office Furniture
landing.subtitle: We work to provide integrated furniture solutions that combine quality, functionality and modern design to meet the diverse needs of our clients.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a company specialized in office furniture
about.description: works to provide integrated furniture solutions that combine quality, functionality and modern design to meet the diverse needs of our clients.
about.feature1: More than 15 years of experience in the office furniture field.
about.feature3: Designs that suit all tastes and spaces.
about.feature4: Custom service for equipping halls and classrooms.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide a wide range of specialized services

service1.title: Integrated Office Furniture
service1.description: Desks, chairs, cabinets and shelves with high quality and modern designs that suit different work environments.

service2.title: Classroom Equipment
service2.description: Practical and comfortable seats for classrooms and lecture halls, ensuring a better educational environment and continuity in use.

service3.title: Meeting Room Furnishing
service3.description: Complete equipment for meeting rooms with modern touches that provide comfort and professionalism during meetings.

service4.title: Custom Seating and Sofas
service4.description: Elegant seating and sofas suitable for offices and homes, with the possibility of choosing colors and sizes according to your taste.

service5.title: Custom Designs and Tailoring by Measurements
service5.description: We provide furniture tailoring service with custom sizes and designs that meet your specific requirements and fit your space perfectly.

slide1.title: Desks and Chairs
slide1.description: Elegant desks and comfortable chairs designed to support your daily productivity, with multiple options suitable for small companies and large institutions.

slide2.title: Study Chairs
slide2.description: Study and lecture chairs with practical and comfortable designs, ensuring a better educational experience and suitable for long-term use

slide3.title: Sofas and Seating
slide3.description: Modern sofas and seating that add a touch of comfort and elegance to your offices or homes, with the possibility of custom tailoring

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Our distinguished works and successful projects
